name: Inazuma: The Islands of Thunder and Eternity - Series I

achievements.name: Continental Explorer: Land of Surging Thunder (I)
achievements.desc: Light up the Narukami Island, Kannazuka, and Yashiori Island areas of the Inazuma map.

achievements.name: Thunderbolting Across the Land (I)
achievements.desc: Unlock all Teleport Waypoints in the Narukami Island, Kannazuka, and Yashiori Island areas of Inazuma.

achievements.name: Sanctuary Pilgrim: Inazuma Tenryou (I)
achievements.desc: Unlock all Shrines of Depths in the Narukami Island, Kannazuka, and Yashiori Island areas of Inazuma.

achievements.name: Eternal Thunder
achievements.desc: Upgrade the Statues of The Seven in Inazuma to their maximum level.

achievements.name: Divine Roots
achievements.desc: Reach the Max Level of Sacred Sakura's Favor.

achievements.name: Naku Weed Whacker (I)
achievements.desc: Follow 10 Electro Seelie on Narukami Island, Kannazuka, and Yashiori Island in Inazuma.

achievements.name: Naku Weed Whacker (I)
achievements.desc: Follow 20 Electro Seelie on Narukami Island, Kannazuka, and Yashiori Island in Inazuma.

achievements.name: Naku Weed Whacker (I)
achievements.desc: Follow 40 Electro Seelie on Narukami Island, Kannazuka, and Yashiori Island in Inazuma.

achievements.name: Lights Will Guide You Home (I)
achievements.desc: Follow 4 Seelie to their Seelie Courts on Narukami Island, Kannazuka, and Yashiori Island in Inazuma.

achievements.name: Lights Will Guide You Home (I)
achievements.desc: Follow 8 Seelie to their Seelie Courts on Narukami Island, Kannazuka, and Yashiori Island in Inazuma.

achievements.name: Lights Will Guide You Home (I)
achievements.desc: Follow 16 Seelie to their Seelie Courts on Narukami Island, Kannazuka, and Yashiori Island in Inazuma.

achievements.name: Lightning-Riding Treasure Hunter (I)
achievements.desc: Open 100 Chests on Narukami Island, Kannazuka, and Yashiori Island in Inazuma.

achievements.name: Lightning-Riding Treasure Hunter (I)
achievements.desc: Open 200 Chests on Narukami Island, Kannazuka, and Yashiori Island in Inazuma.

achievements.name: Lightning-Riding Treasure Hunter (I)
achievements.desc: Open 300 Chests on Narukami Island, Kannazuka, and Yashiori Island in Inazuma.

achievements.name: Spring Cleaning
achievements.desc: Complete the Sacred Sakura Cleansing Ritual.

achievements.name: Tatara Tales
achievements.desc: Resolve the crisis at the Mikage Furnace.

achievements.name: Echo of Fury
achievements.desc: Complete "Orobashi's Legacy."

achievements.name: Lightning-Riding Adventurer (I)
achievements.desc: Complete 6 Open World mechanism-activated Time Trial Challenges on Narukami Island, Kannazuka, and Yashiori Island in Inazuma.

achievements.name: Lightning-Riding Adventurer (I)
achievements.desc: Complete 12 Open World mechanism-activated Time Trial Challenges on Narukami Island, Kannazuka, and Yashiori Island in Inazuma.

achievements.name: Lightning-Riding Adventurer (I)
achievements.desc: Complete 24 Open World mechanism-activated Time Trial Challenges on Narukami Island, Kannazuka, and Yashiori Island in Inazuma.
